title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2016 - Melbourne, Australia
description:
Registration open on Eventbrite (https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-melbourne-2016-tickets-27402867715) 
https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-melbourne-2016-tickets-27402867715 
The $10 deposit will be refunded when you arrive at the venue for the event or cancel the booking at least 1 week prior to the event. 
We made the tickets paid to minimise last minute cancellations & help us more accurately forecast the numbers. The tickets costs will be refunded (with an exception of $1.24 Eventbrite fee) to all who attend the event. If you have to cancel, we will refund the ticket cost if you notify us by at least one week prior to the event. 
T (http://www.rea-group.com/)he eventbrite registration page and other details will be added soon
